Name: 't Sluisje
Review Text: Last Sunday we had a wonderful evening at t Sluisje. The performance of the artist was great and the food was really great. They know how to make it an unforgettable evening.

Name: 't Sluisje
Review Text: it's a lot of fun! only try once, but the people we were with were all crazy and we all dance all night together. Drag Queens were very nice and fun with very nice style üíñThe show is about lip sync. Go for it!

Name: 't Sluisje
Review Text: They started the show an hour late, the food was dry and not that flavorful, and the shows were not that great. I was expecting better given the price. ‚Ä¶

Name: 't Sluisje
Review Text: It was a perfect a really perfect night. The girls were amazing an the food was so fantastic. We definitely will come back next time in Amsterdam. ‚Ä¶

Name: 't Sluisje
Review Text: What an amazing evening. Great food, lots of drink and what a show. Can't wait to visit again.

Name: 't Sluisje
Review Text: The best night out in Amsterdam. Food is excellent and drinks reasonable and the show is exquisite. The ladies are divine and the outfits outstanding. Any reservations about not speaking Dutch are should be ignored, everyone in our group loved it and we will certainly be back again for sure

Name: 't Sluisje
Review Text: We were here for the Drag Queen Dinner, and had a fabulous time! The queens were all beautiful, funny and talented, and provided a great night of entertainment. ‚Ä¶

Name: 't Sluisje
Review Text:
Fabulous fun!
Small but extremely cosy spot in the middle of Amsterdam, nicely located close to Spuistraat, where you can find a lot of other gay friendly bars. ‚Ä¶

Name: 't Sluisje
Review Text: This is a fun and friendly LGBT bar in the center of Amsterdam. It's super cosy (small) but the crowd is friendly. Reasonably priced drinks. The crowd is more in their early 20's to early 30's. Definitely worth checking ou for a fun night out.

Name: 't Sluisje
Review Text: What a fun evening! The food was excellent, show was fab, great atmosphere and service. Everything exceeded my expectations, I look forward to returning.

Name: 't Sluisje
Review Text: Amazing place, came for my sister's hen do. We had a great time, it was so funny and entertaining plus food is exceptional. Positively they speak in English too!

Name: 't Sluisje
Review Text: Amazing drag place, fun, great crowd.

Name: 't Sluisje
Review Text: Great food and entertainment in an intimate, friendly setting!

Name: 't Sluisje
Review Text: My girlfriends and I had a super fun evening out and we'll be back - highly recommended!!!

Name: 't Sluisje
Review Text: Fun little cafe. Good experience for tourists wanting to get a taste of Dutch drag.
